---
id: freight-upload-freight-signature-attachment
title: "Upload freight signature"
description: "Upload a signature image (e.g. proof of pickup or delivery) for a freight identified by its Swipload reference. The signature type indicates whether it is a pickup or delivery signature."
sidebar_label: "Upload freight signature"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "put api-method"
info_path: docs/api/swipload-integrations-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Upload freight signature"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/freight/{reference}/signature/{signatureType}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Upload a signature image (e.g. proof of pickup or delivery) for a freight identified by its Swipload reference. The signature type indicates whether it is a pickup or delivery signature.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
